predicate.note: Frames file for 'overlay' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Its supposedly austere minimalism overlays a bombast that makes one yearn for the astringency of neoclassical Stravinsky, the genuinely radical minimalism of Berg and Webern, and what in retrospect even seems like concision in Mahler.
example.arg: a bombast that makes one yearn for the astringency of neoclassical Stravinsky, the genuinely radical minimalism of Berg and Webern, and what in retrospect even seems like concision in Mahler

example.name: passive
example.text: ``The only thing you don't have,'' he said, ``is the `portfolio insurance' phenomenon overlaid [*] on the rest.''
